basics.name: Igor Mirćić
basics.label: Front-End Web Developer
basics.summary: Motivated and hardworking, glad to learn and acquire experience. Ready to take responsibility as a member of a team. Have been interested in electronic devices since childhood.

work.summary: Worked on three projects with increasing difficulty. First project was landing page with focus on setting up dev environment with webpack and learning advanced SCSS concepts. Second project was a shop page utilizing REST API and handlebars tempesting. Finally third project was app for displaying country info and was made with Angular framework and REST Countries API

education.institution: Faculty of Electronic Engineering - University of Nis

keywords: CSS / SCSS / BEM / Styled Components / MUI

projects.name: Where in world?
projects.description: In this project, I worked with REST Counties API, React and MUI to create app that displays information about countries. The design is from frontendmentor.io
